description.oldValue:
With supported occupancy sensor hardware, a notification banner is displayed on the Teams panel if the room is occupied when it is available or if the room is not occupied when it is reserved. The room will also be auto checked in when the sensor detects occupancy if check in is enabled.
GA date: December CY2022
description.newValue:
With supported occupancy sensor hardware, a notification banner is
displayed on the Teams panel if the room is occupied when it is available or if
the room is not occupied when it is reserved. The room will also be auto
checked in when the sensor detects occupancy if check in is enabled.
